title: Polish layered salad
ingredients: ['Salad layers', '3 to 4 large beetroots', '2 large carrots', '3 to 4 hard-boiled eggs, chopped', '1 (300g) jar pickled mushrooms, drained and diced', 'Dressing', '120ml mayonnaise', '120ml soured cream', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper', '1 teaspoon mustard']
